scripts.clean: rm -rf docs test disttest .nyc_output coverage dist lib ./foftmochajs.html
scripts.pretest: clear && rm -rf test coverage .nyc_output && rsync -rv src/* test
scripts.preqtest: clear && rm -rf test && rsync -rv src/* test
scripts.qtest: echo "quick test" && standard "src/* test/* lib/index.js lib/main.js lib/foft.js" && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require esm ./test/mocha/nodetestrunner.js
scripts.pretestw: clear && rm -rf test && rsync -rv src/* test
scripts.testw: standard "src/* test/* lib/index.js lib/main.js lib/foft.js" && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --watch --reporter=min --require esm ./test/mocha/nodetestrunner.js
scripts.bbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib --ignore "src/mocha/, src/browserentry.js"
scripts.predisttest: clear && rm -rf disttest && mkdir disttest && cp src/mocha/custommochainfo.css src/mocha/foftmochajs.html disttest && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] src/mocha/browsertestrunner.js -o disttest/foftmochajs-browser.js
scripts.disttest: echo See test results at: && echo "file://$(pwd)/disttest/foftmochajs.html" && echo
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run doc && npm run dist
